Question: Samsung Health CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Samsung

Samsung Health (Part of Galaxy Watch6 Series)

 - Offers innovative health features
 - Provides wellness insights
 - Utilizes AI capabilities for enhanced user experience
